block.p: American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Optioned INF Keith Luuloa to Edmonton of the PCL. BOSTON RED SOX--Recalled INF Andy Sheets from Pawtucket of the International League. Purchased the contract of RHP Hippolito Pichardo from Pawtucket. Optioned LHP Tim Young to Pawtucket. Tranferred RHP Bret Saberhagen from the 15-to the 60-day disabled list. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Traded RHP Tanyon Sturtze to the Tampa Bay Devil Rays for INF Tony Graffanino. Assigned Graffanino to Charlotte of the International League.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Optioned INF Keith Luuloa to Edmonton of the PCL. BOSTON RED SOX--Recalled INF Andy Sheets from Pawtucket of the International League. Purchased the contract of RHP Hippolito Pichardo from Pawtucket. Optioned LHP Tim Young to Pawtucket. Tranferred RHP Bret Saberhagen from the 15-to the 60-day disabled list. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Traded RHP Tanyon Sturtze to the Tampa Bay Devil Rays for INF Tony Graffanino. Assigned Graffanino to Charlotte of the International League.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Placed 1B Erubiel Durazo on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of INF Craig Counsell from Tucson of the PCL. ATLANTA BRAVES--Purchased the contract of LHP Jeff Granger from Long Island of the Atlantic League and assigned him to Richmond of the International League. CHICAGO CUBS--Activated 1B Mark Grace from the 15-day disabled list. Placed INF Jose Nieves on the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Ruben Quevedo to Iowa of the PCL. Purchased the contract of SS Augie Ojeda from Iowa. FLORIDA MARLINS--Placed RHP Dan Miceli on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 30. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Placed C Todd Hundley on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Alex Cora from Albuquerque of the PCL. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Activated RHP Curtis Leskanic from the 15-day disabled list. Sent RHP Hector Ramirez outright to Indianapolis of the International League. MONTREAL EXPOS--Placed RHP Hideki Irabu on the 15-day disabled list. Called up RHP Matt Skrmetta from Ottawa of the International League.

National Football League CAROLINA PANTHERS--Named Mark Koncz director of pro scouting, Tony Softli director of college scouting, Ted Plumb pro scout, Max McCartney and Jay Mondock college scouts, and Kenny Roberson and Ryan Cowden scouting assistants. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed DB Earl Little to a three-year contract. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Re-signed WR Tony Gaiter. Named Jake Hallum area scout.

National Hockey League CAROLINA HURRICANES--Agreed to terms with D Shaun Fisher on a multiyear contract. Traded F Paul Ranheim to the Philadelphia Flyers for a 2002 eighth-round entry draft pick. DALLAS STARS--Signed RW Tyler Bouck to a three-year contract. EDMONTON OILERS--Re-elected Cal Nichols chairman of the board of directors. Signed F Michael Henrich to a three-year contract. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed LW Brad Richards to a three-year contract.
OLYMPIC REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY--Named Dmitriy Kavunov freestyle skiing coach.

BRADLEY--Named Scot Latek sports information intern. CAMERON--Named Adrian Wiggins women's basketball coach. CENTENARY--Named Randy Lee men's assistant basketball coach. CHARLESTON SOUTHERN--Named Jermaine Scott men's assistant basketball coach. CURRY--Named Caitlin Roberts women's lacrosse coach and women's assistant soccer coach. DREXEL--Named Candace Crabtree women's basketball coach. FORDHAM--Named John DeFilippo quarterbacks coach. LIFE--Announced the retirement of Roger Kaiser, men's basketball coach. LYCOMING--Named Katherine Roberts women's soccer and lacrosse coach. MICHIGAN--Promoted Scott Trost from men's assistant basketball coach to men's associate head basketball coach.
